# Luminous Assassin (Spell)
## Overview
[[Conjuration Spells|Conjuration]] ([[Summoning Spells|summoning]])

**Level:** [[5th Level Sorcerer Spells|Sorcerer 5]], [[5th Level Wizard Spells|Wizard 5]]

**BoXM:** [[BoXM 9th-Level Wizard Spells List|Wizard 9]]

**Casting Time:** 1 standard action

**Components:** V, S, F

**Range:** Medium (100 ft. + 10 ft./level)

**Effect:** One summoned assassin

**Duration:** 1 round/level

**Saving Throw:** None

**Spell Resistance:** No

**Source:** Player's Handbook II (WotC), pg. 117

*You conjure a vaguely humanoid being composed of yellow light. It wields a radiant blade and moves with unearthly grace.*

This spell functions like *[[Luminous Assassin, Lesser (Spell)|lesser luminous assassin]]**,* except that the assassin has the statistics provided below.

**Luminous Assassin CR 3**

Male human rogue 3

N Medium humanoid (human, extraplanar)

**Init** +6; **Senses** Listen +6, Spot +6

**Languages** Common, Dwarven, Elven

**AC 16**, touch 12, flat-footed 14; [[Dodge (Feat)|Dodge]], [[Mobility (Feat)|Mobility]] (+2 Dex, +3 armor, +1 shield)

**hp** 16 (3 HD)

**Resist** evasion

**Fort** +3, **Ref** +6, **Will** +2

**Speed** 30 ft. (6 squares)

**Melee** mwk rapier +4 (1d6+1/18–20)

**Ranged** mwk shortbow +5 (1d6+1/×3)

**Base Atk** +2; **Grp** +3

**Atk Options** sneak attack +2d6

**Combat Gear** *potion of cure moderate wounds, potion of darkvision*

**Abilities** Str 12, Dex 15, Con 13, Int 14, Wis 10, Cha 8

**Feats** [[Dodge (Feat)|Dodge]], [[Improved Initiative (Feat)|Improved Initiative]], [[Mobility (Feat)|Mobility]]

**Skills** [[Acrobatics (Skill)|Acrobatics]] (3.5 Balance, Tumble +8) +8, [[Appraise (Skill)|Appraise]] +8,  [[Disable Device (Skill)|Disable Device]] +8 (3.5 Open Lock +8), [[Escape Artist (Skill)|Escape Artist]] +8, [[Perception (Skill)|Perception]] +8 (Listen +6, Search +8, Spot +6), [[Stealth (Skill)|Stealth]] +8 (3.5 Hide +8, Move Silently +8)

**Possessions** combat gear plus masterwork studded leather armor, masterwork rapier, masterwork buckler, *[[Cloak of Resistance +1|cloak of resistance +1]]*, masterwork shortbow, 200 gp
